Text:
I can't believe there's only 6 left after this one! I'll be so sad when Amazing Spider-Man finishes with #700.

Thanks mdusanjay!!!!

Thank you as always.

Ah....what do you mean finishing ?  No more spiderman ?

Apparently Marvel is retiring Amazing Spider-Man after issue #700, when they're Marvel Now campaign launches. 

The way Dan Slott has come across with his statement that he will have to go into hiding for fear of death threats from Spider fans, after #700 hits the shelves, suggests that maybe he won't be writing Spider-Man after that.

Avenging may turn into his premier title or they may launch a new title. I haven't seen the solicits or previews for a new Spidey title launch yet however.
Also, I thought this was a weak arc overall. I'm glad it's over.
